attributes.action: During Trump's visit set up a meeting with representatives of ostracised nations
attributes.background: Rather than refusing for him to come, we could use the opportunity to educate him that people are people regardless of their origin.  We should demonstrate the power of discussion over exclusion.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you mean by "ostracised nations". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
